title: while i am no expert an adversarial attacks in deep learning, the results are compelling imho
review:
imho, this manuscript is clearly written, addresses a confusing point in the current literature, clarifies some issues, and provides a novel and useful approach to mitigate those issues. 
reading the other comments online, the authors seem to have addressed those concerns as well.
confidence: 2: The reviewer is willing to defend the evaluation, but it is quite likely that the reviewer did not understand central parts of the paper
